      • makeJsonUtility

        public Level makeJsonUtility​(java.lang.String[][] testArray)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        utility function for mass calling the main function of LevelJsonMaker. Turns a 2d Array of strings (as they would be when converted from CSV) into a JSON file. Then loads said JSON file into a Level object, and returns the Level object.
        Parameters:
        testArray - 2d ArrayList of strings, representing a processed CSV.
        Returns:
        the level as Loaded by LevelJsonReader.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - In case of formatting issues;

      • arrayToList
